content.rendered:
PHP is a powerful server-side scripting language for creating dynamic and interactive websites and applications. PHP is the widely-used, free, and efficient alternative to competitors such as Microsoft’s ASP. PHP is perfectly suited for Web development and can be embedded directly into the HTML code. Worldwide in I.T. industry lot of  jobs are available for PHP professionals. Skilled Engineers are always demanded in IT companies.

PHP Advantages and Benefits

Know about Diploma in Web Development with PHP-MySQL

PHP COURSE IN puneBY Vmaxinfo Institute

Vmaxinfo Instituteis one of the renowned institute for PHP MySQL Training in Pune, India and worldwide. We cover Basic PHP course and Advanced PHP course in Nasik which are most job oriented courses in Pune, Mumbai, Pune or any part of India. With Advanced PHP Training we cover  different modules like HTML, CSS, Dreamweaver, WordPress, Javascript,  bootstrap, Web Hosting and live projects. Our training is with Practical approach at Professional Level. Our PHP training covers Introduction, Local Server, Syntax, variables, function, operators, statements, loop, array, sorting, Get and Post method, format, include, file handling, session, cookies, error handling, database connectivity and management.

Course contents:

BASIC PHP

  • PHP introduction & Installation
  • PHP Syntax
  • variables
  • Data Type
  • Strings and constant
  • Operators in PHP
  • If-else, While, Switch, Loops
  • array in PHP
  • Form handling and validation

ADVANCED PHP

  • Multidimensional Array
  • Date & Time
  • include function
  • File Handling in PHP
  • Session & Cookies
  • MySQL Database connectivity
  • Create Database
  • Insert, Update, Delete data
  • Web Hosting
  • Live Project

We give experience to our students to work on live projects who join PHP class in our organization. Vmaxinfo InstitutePHP course fees is very reasonable to what that covers in the course. Also all students get individual assistance and good guidance for placement.
